description: LFMC (Live Fuel Moisture Content) prediction dataset with modular features

lfmc_base.parquet.description: Base LFMC dataset with coordinates, dates, species, and target values

lfmc_aef.parquet.description: AlphaEarth vision embeddings (64 dimensions) for LFMC samples

lfmc_daymet.parquet.description: Daymet weather features (precipitation, temperature, radiation, etc.) for LFMC samples

usage.python: from lfmc_dataset import LFMCDataset; dataset = LFMCDataset(auto_download=True, use_aef=True)

features.base: 9 columns (sample_id, lat, lon, elevation, date, species, lfmc_percent, etc.)
features.daymet: 21 Daymet weather features (prcp, tmin, tmax, srad, vp, dayl, swe + derived)
